long_description: Ensure your rear end is seen with the Knog Blinder 1 rear bike light, which boasts a bright red LED and hassle-free mounting, making it easy to alert others to your presence. Single red LED bulb puts out up to 11 lumens of light to increase your visibility to oncomers; anodized aluminum facing offers a choice of color and style. Waterproof construction ensures lasting performance no matter the weather. Tailor the lighting to your preferences with a 5 different lighting modes, from a bright steady mode to a battery-saving flash mode and options between. Battery life ranges from 2 hrs. in constant mode up to 11 hrs. in eco-flash mode; battery can be recharged via integrated USB plug. Mounting the Knog Blinder 1 rear bike light is easy and tool-free thanks to the flexible silicone strap and clip; fits seat or frame tubes with diameters 22 - 32mm.
short_description: Ensure your rear end is seen with the Knog Blinder 1 rear bike light, which boasts a bright red LED and hassle-free mounting, making it easy to alert others to your presence.
